an3.61:12.4.pli: Cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā somanassaṭṭhāniyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati domanassaṭṭhāniyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati upekkhāṭṭhāniyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati,
an3.61:12.4.en: Seeing a sight with the eye, one is preoccupied with a sight that’s a basis for [38;5;121mhappiness or sadness or equanimity[0m.

an3.61:12.9.pli: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya somanassaṭṭhāniyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati domanassaṭṭhāniyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati upekkhāṭṭhāniyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati.
an3.61:12.9.en: Becoming conscious of a thought with the mind, one is preoccupied with a thought that’s a basis for [38;5;121mhappiness or sadness or equanimity[0m.

mn137:8.3.pli: ‘Cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā somanassaṭṭhānīyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati, domanassaṭṭhānīyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati, upekkhāṭṭhānīyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati.
mn137:8.3.en: Seeing a sight with the eye, one is preoccupied with a sight that’s a basis for [38;5;121mhappiness or sadness or equanimity[0m.

mn137:8.8.pli: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya somanassaṭṭhānīyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati, domanassaṭṭhānīyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati, upekkhāṭṭhānīyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati.
mn137:8.8.en: Becoming conscious of a thought with the mind, one is preoccupied with a thought that’s a basis for [38;5;121mhappiness or sadness or equanimity[0m.

mn140:10.3.pli: Cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā somanassaṭṭhāniyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati, domanassaṭṭhāniyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati, upekkhāṭṭhāniyaṁ rūpaṁ upavicarati;
mn140:10.3.en: Seeing a sight with the eye, one is preoccupied with a sight that’s a basis for [38;5;121mhappiness or sadness or equanimity[0m.

mn140:10.8.pli: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya somanassaṭṭhāniyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati, domanassaṭṭhāniyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati, upekkhāṭṭhāniyaṁ dhammaṁ upavicarati—
mn140:10.8.en: Becoming conscious of a thought with the mind, one is preoccupied with a thought that’s a basis for [38;5;121mhappiness or sadness or equanimity[0m.
